attributes.review: Too slow, too many notifications, spammed my phone so much I had to get a new one. Don’t recommend this app at all. One star for you.
attributes.title: DONT GET IT! 2 STAR!

attributes.review: Disgusting, horrible app took way to long to download ruined so many things on my phone this is out of hand
this app put a horrible virus on my phone, it’s a miracle i’m even able to text right now! also my mom died three days after installation. i repeat DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!

attributes.review: This app ruined my life, when I got the app my dog immediately died and my stuffed animal turned into Annabel, my fish drowned, I got hacked, and suddenly all of my friends became trump supporters. Honestly my worst nightmare!! DO NOT THIS APP IF YOU DONT WANT TO BE CURSED!!! 🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊
attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY WORST APP EVER!!!

attributes.review: IT TOOK ME A WEEK TO DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!! then after it was downloaded it stole all my personal info and sold it to russia truly terrible app almost as bad as donald trump himself then again that wouldn’t be doing the app  justice
attributes.title: TERRIBLE

attributes.review:
So I downloaded this app because I support Mr. Cheetos and as soon as the app finished downloading, I started getting bad luck. So for the sake of you safety I would advise you not to get this app.
